Description:
Move In And Enjoy!
The Feel:
Set in a great position near schools & shops, this as new home boasts dual living areas, open plan design & 4 bedrooms. The kitchen incorporates a generous island bench, stainless steel appliances & a walk-in pantry, overlooking the meals area which leads to a covered alfresco area. The master bedroom has a large WIR & en suite, & a central bathroom services the other 3 bedrooms. Ducted heating, DLUG & double gates to the rear for caravan or boat storage make this a must-inspect.
The Facts:
-Well-presented brick veneer 4-bedroom family home
-First impressions of neat well-kept garden & covered portico entrance
-Open plan layout with lovely treed outlook from kitchen, living and meals area
-Sliding doors to north-facing covered outdoor living area, large lawn & boundary plantings
-Carpeted 2nd living area offers relaxed lounge or versatile games room/rumpus
-Light, bright spaces, with tiled entry, hall & main living + carpet to all bedrooms
-Quality s/s appliances; 900mm electric oven, 5 burner gas cooktop, dishwasher + walk-in pantry
-South-facing Master with double door entry, en suite & roomy walk-in robe
-3 more well-appointed bedrooms with BIRs to accommodate a growing family
-Main family bathroom with bath & shower, Tastic heater, plus separate toilet
-Ducted heating throughout
-Fantastic location close to all facilities & within the ever-popular school precinct
-RC DLUG w/ TV point & rear door access
-Double gates provide practical OSP in the backyard for cars, boat or a caravan
The Owner Loves.
We love the privacy of our sunny backyard, and its a great neighbourhood with easy access to schools, reserves, shops & beaches.

Description:
LAST ONE REMAINING
Central Drysdale location in an intimate residential estate. All amenities are just a short walking distance from your future home. The best of a coastal lifestyle and a semi rural, close knit community with every convenience at your doorstep. This is the last titled block available.
The peninsula location is renowned for the idyllic, outdoor lifestyle. Central to bay side beaches, local wineries, great schools and great fishing spots.The Port Phillip Ferry sails daily from Portarlington and South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. You will ask yourself why you didn't make the move sooner.

Description:
Country lifestyle, town convenience
Meander up the winding tree-lined gravel driveway to the grand residence set on almost 6 acres and begin to relax in the peaceful surrounds. Open the remote controlled double iron gates to the main residence with welcoming water feature or wander up the private track to the guest cottage.
The house boasts an enormous open living room, currently being used as three dining & casual living areas. The main living area is warmed by a slow combustion fireplace and ducted heating, also throughout the whole house.
The modern kitchen has new stainless steel appliances, plenty of cupboards & bench space, overlooking the open plan living area.
The south wing contains three bedrooms & two bathrooms.
A study off the main entry with built in desks & book cases could be an extra bedroom with its own built in robes.
The spacious master bedroom with modern ensuite & walk in robe overlooks the grounds.
The separate dining area opens out to the "Observatory", just one of many outdoor entertaining areas.
The timber gazebo outdoor fire pit is just a small part of creating a fantastic outdoor lifestyle.
A working organic hobby farm with productive orchard & watering system throughout.
The work the owners have put into this property is outstanding, with landscaped gardens adorning the residence.
A fully renovated separate COTTAGE with its own power meter, is ideally suited for co-generational living or an AirBnB business. A quaint verandah, large living space, two bedrooms, bathroom, modern fitout this is a stylish addition away from the main house.
The layout of the property lends itself to numerous pursuits; from 4 paddocks for the pony(s), alpacas, sheep & goats each with their own water supply. Over the road was a successful bulb farm due to the light loamy, easy to dig soil.
There are a multitude of sheds; from paddock shelters, wood, hothouse, nursery, aviaries, gym, utilities, tractor, car & boat. The list seems endless.
The large rumpus room is ideal as a mancave, all you need is to bring your memorabilia.
The large machinery shed is ideally suit for those with earthmoving equipment or a big boat.
Plenty of tanks for water (43 thousand litres of water) with the backup of mains water.
6.5 Kw solar system to reduce your environment impact.
With plenty of hardstanding there is no shortage of parking.
The boundaries are lined with maturing trees offering a privacy from the main road & neighbours.
The property is a very short distance from the prestigious St Ignatius College, Bellarine Secondary & St Thomas'.
This is location living; offering country lifestyle with town convenience; Drysdale Bypass access; walk to schools, town centre, Lake Lorne; short drive to Coles, Aldi, Safeway, Bunnings & Kmart.
Insights: 168 Princess Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Delightful lifestyle With Idyllic Surroundings
At the southern end of Drysdale, this neat contemporary home offers an ideal lifestyle for first home buyers, a small family, or someone looking to downsize. Located just a short stroll away from Lorne Lake Reserve and the historic Drysdale station and rail line, there's lots of natural wildlife to discover, and picnic spots by the dozen.
With an elevated driveway to a double garage, a central entrance opens to a tiled passage with the master bedroom and ensuite sitting adjacent. A linen press and Euro-style laundry behind double cupboard doors also occupy the passage.
A bright open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge area reveals itself with a sliding door to a covered, north-facing patio where barbecues and alfresco entertainment are a natural. The kitchen boasts an electric oven with a 4-burner gas cooktop, plus a dishwasher built into the island bench/breakfast bar.
Two more bedrooms share a second bathroom with shower, bath, and vanity - plus a separate WC. Front and rear gardens are well established and feature low-maintenance yukkas, succulents, and native grasses. There are ceiling fans throughout, plus a split system in the lounge - providing year-round comfort.
- Contemporary family home in quiet Drysdale street
- Three bedrooms - master with ensuite and dressing room
- Main bathroom with shower, bath, vanity - separate WC
- Open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge to covered alfresco patio
- Euro-style laundry, double garage, low-maintenance garden
- Split system and ceiling fans for year-round comfort.

Description:
HISTORICAL HOMESTEAD, BEAUTIFULLY RENOVATED!
A unique opportunity to buy a period gem on approx. 1230 SQM and within walking distance of the Drysdale village, parks, schools and the Rail Trail. The open plan living area is spacious with large well designed kitchen, dining, and french doors open to the long verandah. The second lounge room looks out over the mature gardens with doors opening to numerous entertaining areas. Dine in style or just relax in the hammock. 4 bedrooms, master with extra large WIR and ensuite, two more bathrooms, study and fantastic laundry. Other outstanding features include timber floors, fireplace, three split systems, pantry, dishwasher, water tank, loads of storage and so much more to see. The matured garden is fantastic with so many areas to relax for hours, even room for a cricket match. The triple garage is huge. Cars, caravan, boat, and workshop all under one roof with three way entry, and high easy access. A wonderful chance to live in style, layered with history. Maybe do a B&B (second access),or develop (STCA). Ring for an appointment.

Description:
STUNNING PRIVATE RETREAT
Step inside this beautiful property and you will immediately feel at home. Comprising a private front courtyard, 4 bedrooms including 2 with ensuites, designer kitchen and spacious open plan dining and living area leading out to an undercover entertainers deck, this truly is a stunning private retreat situated in close proximity to the Drysdale township with schools, medical clinics, shopping and restaurants all on your doorstep. This home is ideally suited to those who enjoy low maintenance living allowing more time to enjoy all that the beautiful Bellarine has to offer including pristine beaches and award winning wineries. Other features of this fantastic property include ducted heating, split system and a double garage with storage room. An inspection is highly recommended and is sure to impress. Call today!

Description:
'One With The Lot'
Perfectly positioned right in the heart of Drysdale is this contemporary residence boasting unrivalled size and scale! Towering high ceilings complement grand living proportions, expansive window features take full advantage of the northerly aspect, all the modern comforts and the enviable land holding of 762m2 (approx.) ensures this 'home' is simply one that offers it all!
Four beautifully appointed bedrooms plus a study; the master suite is oversized and complete with ensuite and walk in robe
Generous living areas are a fine feature of this home; the primary living zone comprises of a kitchen/family/dining area. The kitchen serves up a great space; expansive dual stone bench tops, 900mm gas cook top, feature tile splash back and a walk in pantry provides excellent storage solutions. The family zone is bathed in natural light courtesy of a wonderful northerly aspect; glass sliding door provides a seamless connection to the decked alfresco.
A second living area provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
The wide open spaces of the 762m2 (approx) land holding is further exaggerated by the neighbouring park lands; flanked by mature gum trees it delivers a tranquil outlook and the pleasant sounds of the native bird life.
All the modern comforts; ducted heating, evaporative cooling and an impressive inclusions list to be discovered upon inspection
Great lifestyle features; including a double remote controlled garage (internal access), dual rear access and additional off street parking
The A+++ location of this property can simply not be overstated; positioned right in the heart of Drysdale close to shops, schools, public transport and some of the most picturesque parklands.
The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wine labels, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the panoramic views of the bay.

Description:
Private, Quiet and Central
Life will be a breeze in this entry level unit located less than 400m (approx.) from the retail hub of Drysdale's town centre. With all amenities within walking distance, this two-bedroom unit is the perfect 'downsizer' or ideal for those looking to enter the Drysdale property market.
The open-plan kitchen/living/dining area provides a beautiful centrepiece for this light-filled home. The kitchen boasts a huge walk-in-pantry, stainless-steel appliances and ample storage and bench space. The home is heated by ducted-gas heating and cooled by evaporative cooling ensuring comfort in even the most extreme weather.
The master bedroom features an ensuite and both bedrooms contain built-in-robes. The second bedroom is serviced by conveniently located bathroom.
Externally the home features a single lock-up garage and a beautiful decked alfresco area, which is protected and fully enclosed - providing the perfect quiet retreat to enjoy a Summer's day.
Short walk to shops, health and medical centres.
Located at the back of a complex of five units you are guaranteed some quiet time in this 2009 built unit!

Description:
Serene Estate
A lifestyle opportunity enabling you to thrive and prosper in an intimate residential estate. Residing in this enviable location offers a lifestyle of coastal living, the convenience of a large regional centre within a 20 minute drive and designed around a semi rural, close knit community with every convenience at your doorstep.
The peninsula location is renowned for the idyllic, outdoor lifestyle. Spend a day at the beach, go fishing or enjoy a glass of your favourite wine at one of our many local wineries. The Port Phillip Ferry sails twice daily from Portarlington to South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. You will ask yourself why you didn't make the move sooner.
Ground works to commence late 2018.
Selling fast, contact Rhonda Humpage 0457 313609

Description:
The Tranquil Treasure!
Beautifully positioned right in the heart of an exclusive pocket of Drysdale, this quality built residence it is sure to be highly sought after. The prime land holding of approximately 643m2 boasts the enviable feature of a corner allotment delivering options a plenty and the ultimate 'sea change' property prospect.
Showcasing great size and scale, landscaped gardens, double remote controlled garage, side/rear access (w/ expansive shedding) and the A+++ location ensures this 'home' is a genuine one of a kind!
4 generously proportioned bedrooms and a study. The master is complete with ensuite and walk in robe
The primary living zone consists of an open plan kitchen/family/meals area; flanked by expansive windows it is light and bright; dual glass doors provide a seamless connection to the sheltered alfresco (perfect for those who love to entertain)
The kitchen itself is beautifully appointed; expansive bench tops, excellent storage solutions complement quality fixtures and fittings
A 2nd independent living zone provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
All the modern comforts; ducted heating and cooling, decorative paving, garden shed, water tanks and many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection
As impressive as this home is, it is the unique lifestyle features that creates an exciting buying prospect. Side/rear access with secure shed (high clearance) is room enough for the caravan, boat and/or the jet ski.
The A+++ location simply cannot be overstated; positioned right in the heart of a boutique pocket of Drysdale. Surrounded by impressive quality homes and perfectly placed to have all of Drysdale's amenities at arms reach (schools, medical services, fully equipped retail sector and a vibrant cafe/restaurant scene. The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wine labels, beautiful parklands, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the panoramic views of the bay

Description:
The Entertainer's Delight
Luxury is an understatement when it comes to this amazing family home.
Upon entry, the sheer size of the property still won't sink in. Eight foot ceilings and spotted gum flooring throughout impresses before walking through the first room; the enormous master bedroom with a walk in robe and ensuite (complete with 1.8m shower and twin vanity) that are just as grand.
A 5 x 3 study, with built in desk sits across the hall from a separate living area, meaning the kids can be entertained by their favourite shows while everyone else can lounge in the main living room.
The open plan kitchen, dining and living room are the central hub of the home, with access to a plentiful walk-in pantry fit for a King... or Queen.
Three spacious bedrooms all with built in robes are serviced by a central bathroom and powder room in the same wing of the home so guests and the rest of the family don't need to walk too far.
Talk about resort living! The backyard has it's own ten person spa, undercover entertaining area and tiered tranquil gardens. An immensely private setting with high fences surrounding the property, barbecue areas and even more that's sure to impress.
In terms of storage, this home boasts a triple garage and still plenty of space for the workshop. You'll also find two garden sheds and a chook pen.
5 kilowatts of solar energy, ducted heating and reverse cycle air conditioning, stone bench tops and much more, all on a 718 sqm block. Only 500 metres from the heart of town.
Stop scrolling and call for an inspection today!

Description:
The one that has it ALL!
Awaiting its lucky new owner, this family home needs to be at the very top of your list! A well-zoned family home equipped with all the mod cons, sublime rural views, direct access to the Bellarine Rail Trail, a grand outdoor entertaining space and rear access with room for all your toys, this is the home that has it all, for the family who want it all!
Perfectly tucked away at the end of a private Cul De Sac and sitting upon a generous 839m2, a recent refresh throughout leaves you with nothing left to do but simply move in, put your feet up and enjoy. Upon entry, you're greeted by a separate lounge and study, which flows to an open plan kitchen, equipped with newly installed 40mm stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances including electric oven, gas cook top, dishwasher and ample storage, which overlooks an expansive living, dining and tranquil sitting nook. 4 bedrooms sprawl from the rear central hallway, the master retreat is equipped with ensuite, walk-in-robe and garden views, bedrooms 2 and 3 are both sun-drenched with natural light and offers rural views, while bedroom 4 overlooks the garden and all boast built-in-robes. A main bathroom with shower, vanity and tiled in bath, separate toilet, laundry with outdoor access and year round comfort is on offer with ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
The perfect entertainer, an expansive outdoor undercover area makes for effortless indoor/outdoor entertaining, complete with a free standing 6 seater Spa. Established foliage lead you quite literally down the garden path to a large open grassed area, which offers direct access to the Bellarine Rail Trail and potential for you to add your own touches, with enough space for extra garaging (STCA) to take full advantage of the rear access for boats, caravans, trailers and everything in between.
Showcasing amazing value for money, an opportunity to secure a home with functionality, space and charm very rarely presents itself. With all schools, public transport and the Drysdale township at your fingertips, this is the lifestyle change you have been waiting for!

Description:
NEW PRICE - Victorian homestead with development opportunity.
This classic double-fronted Victorian residence in an enviable location at the gateway to Drysdale presents an incredibly unique opportunity not to be missed.
Set on a massive 1037m2 of GRZ1 land in a high profile position and offering 2 street frontages, the home provides many options including subdivision (STCA), home business, accommodation or just enjoy the property yourself as a family residence with plenty of space to extend and improve.
A traditional Victorian facade with full return veranda welcomes you to the home, whilst a wide entry hall and 12ft ceiling creates the feeling of space seldom offered in modern living. Generous 3.6m bedrooms include BIRs and feature timber lined walls, high decorative skirts and polished Baltic floorboards. The central bathroom is tiled and boasts a gorgeous free standing claw bath, separate shower and double basins.
A generous formal lounge with fireplace is carpeted and opens through to the rear meals area which overlooks the deck and the north facing gardens.
Climate is controlled year round with ducted heating and cooling.
The commercial style kitchen, whilst functional, offers the new owners a chance to inject their own personal touch with a modern upgrade. A separate laundry and a 2nd toilet complete the internal attributes of the home.
For the hobbyist, a 6m x 3.6m studio / workshop / bungalow separate to the residence provides a flexible space to use as you see fit, whilst an undercover area is set amongst the established trees and abundance of garden beds creating the ultimate outdoor lifestyle.
Superbly positioned to enjoy the best of what the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer with local shops, restaurants and schools all close by. 100m from your doorstep, Lake Lorne offers walking/cycling tracks with stunning birdlife and native trees. The reserves across the road have family BBQ areas and children's playground, whilst the famous
Q Train/Blues Train boards less than 100m from your doorstep.
An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home in an amazing location. Call Dion Plumb now to learn more on 0424 940 629
Insights: 142 High Street, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 10 other 2 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New Home in Boutique Development
Located in Central Walk Estate, Drysdales new boutique residential development, this brand new family home offers an enviable, relaxed lifestyle - just 200 metres from the town centre. Working to a contemporary masterplan, the estate incorporates numerous views to nearby hills populated with mature eucalypts, plus a central reserve that features a creek running through stunning wetlands. Everything here looks as fresh as a daisy. Custom designed by a local builder, this quality home sits comfortably on the lower side of elevated Platinum Avenue, with a neat terraced front garden and a double lock-up garage. From the covered portico, a polished-timber passage leads down to the generous open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge area, while along the way is the master bedroom with its walk-in robe and sparkling ensuite, a lounge/entertainment room with double doors, and a laundry equipped with plenty of cupboard space. The kitchen boasts premium appliances including twin Westinghouse electric ovens, a Technika 5-burner gas cooktop, an Omega dishwasher, and island bench with two sinks, and a walk-in pantry. The lounge/dining section opens onto a covered deck thats made for made for outdoor dining and entertainment. Adjacent to this main living hub are three more bedrooms which share the main bathroom (bath and shower) and a separate WC. Theres remotely controlled heating and cooling throughout, plus a split system and ceiling fans. As the name Central Walk suggests, its an easy walk to just about everything youll need - shops, schools, cafes and restaurants. This is a great opportunity to make a new start in a new home, in a new and vibrant precinct - with all the essentials on your doorstep.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL Value for Money!
For the ultimate WOW factor look no further than 11 Humber Way, Drysdale! There is so much more to this Drysdale residence than meets the eye a true market standout.
The practicality and open plan design of this home certainly caters for the growing family, giving all members room to move. Another fantastic highlight of this home is the ability to entertain, with the multiple living areas and the central kitchen overlooking the bifold doors and undercover area makes for easy breezy entertaining.
The fore of the home is graced with a very lavish master suite measuring 6.8 x 4.2 which gives you plenty room for a reading nook, it also includes a high tech ceiling fan, decked out walk-in robe and impressive ensuite sporting 40mm double in-bench waterfall stone vanity and quality fittings and fixtures. A generous theatre room before flowing into the heart of the home. The open plan kitchen, meals and multiple living areas is a very appealing highlight of this home! The galley style kitchen includes stone benchtops, quality stainless steel appliances such as a dual Smeg rangehood, Omega double wall ovens, Fisher and Paykel double drawer dishwasher, walk-in pantry and ample cupboards and drawers. The dining area sits neatly in between the 2nd living area to the right and the rumpus to the left. The rear to the home is zoned with the 4th living/lounge room, bedrooms 2,3 and 4 are all fitted with built-in robes and equipped with a main bathroom where the quality has carried through including a tiled in deep bath and separate toilet. The laundry is neatly located off the kitchen with an abundance of storage and access into the garage and the yard. The rumpus room and 4th living area have fantastic access via the timber bifold doors out onto the expansive double decked alfresco which has been fitted with café blinds, ceiling fan, lights and outdoor power. In addition to this impressive area there is an undercover barbequing area and plenty of room to run around or implement a garden of your choice. This low maintenance garden also comes with gated access to the rail trail- can this home get any better?
Features of this already impressive pad include quality timber floors, new carpets, freshly painted throughout, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, custom lighting, alarm system, double lock up garage with remote/internal and external access.
This home is the pinnacle of practical family living coupled with a sizeable block on 700+m2 with the Bellarine Rail Trail on your doorstep and moments to all the Townships major amenities including schools and public transport.
Properties in this pocket don't last long, strike while the iron is hot!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
STYLISH TOWNHOUSE, BAY VIEWS & WALK TO TOWN
This 3 bedroom townhouse will entice the astute buyer. Tiled entrance, open plan living area, dining, kitchen and undercover outdoor patio framed by leafy landscaped garden ... easy to entertain. Third bedroom downstairs, powder room, study nook and laundry. Upstairs are the 2 main bedrooms, two way bathroom and WIR. Other features include ducted heating, two air conditioners, quality fittings and furnishings, storage and generous single garage. Solar panels reduce electricity costs. Live well now, invest well or buy now to live later.

Description:
CONTEMPORARY & STYLISH ABODE
This stunning architecturally designed & custom built Dennehy residence showcases class and style of a calibre rarely seen. From the very first steps through the front garden landscaped with beautiful natives you will feel as if you have finally found the one! Upon entering the home you are instantly greeted by the warmth of Tasmanian Oak flooring and the contemporary & spacious feel of the cleverly designed floor plan which sympathizes with the natural flow of the land over two levels. The northerly aspect of the landscaped rear garden is perfectly captured through the floor to ceiling glass sliding doors of the open plan kitchen, dining & living space which features superb polished concrete floors & an ambient double sided fireplace enjoyed by dual living areas. An expansive deck spans the entire length of the lower level of the home and is perfect for entertaining. The stunning kitchen features a minimalist design with a deluxe walk in pantry and quality fixtures and fittings. This fabulous home further comprises 4 generously proportioned bedrooms including Master suite with WIR & stylish ensuite plus a third living space also suited as a kids activity area or study. This truly is an amazing opportunity to secure a luxurious home built into the natural landscape with an abundance of space, style & privacy on approx 807m2 with nothing to do but move in and enjoy the Bellarine lifestyle!

Description:
The Jewel Of Drysdale!
Do you desire the ultimate 'downsize' prospect? Perfectly positioned within one of Drysdale's premiere cul-de-sac's is this charming, character filled residence. A stunning tree lined street, quality homes as far as the eye can see, neighbouring parklands and a short stroll to Drysdale's fully equipped retail hub fully endorses the A+ location!
X2 generously proportioned bedrooms; master is complete with a trio of floor to ceiling built in robes and an ensuite
The primary living zone is a fine example of open plan design; an enviable northerly orientation is complemented by expansive windows which promote lovely filtered light and a front row seat to take in glorious established gardens
The kitchen serves up a wonderful space; there is absolutely no compromise on size and scale. Expansive benchtops and excellent storage solutions complement stainless steel appliances and quality fixtures
All the modern comforts; gas ducted heating, split system cooling, custom window furnishings and many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection
A prime land holding of 489m2 (approx) is enhanced by a stunning established garden setting; the corner allotment profile provides further user friendly qualities
A double remote controlled garage with internal access
The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wineries, a vibrant cafe and restaurant scene, fully equipped medical services, beautiful parklands and the tranquillity of the 'sea change' are all at 'arms reach' if you are lucky enough to secure the charming 1 Pascoe Place, Drysdale
